Name: locktype
Description: type of the lockable object: relation, extend, page, tuple, transactionid, virtualxid, object, userlock, or advisory

Name: database
Description: oid of the database in which the object exists, or zero if the object is a shared object, or null if the object is a transaction id

Name: relation
Description: oid of the relation, or null if the object is not a relation or part of a relation

Name: page
Description: page number within the relation, or null if the object is not a tuple or relation page

Name: tuple
Description: tuple number within the page, or null if the object is not a tuple

Name: virtualxid
Description: virtual id of a transaction, or null if the object is not a virtual transaction id

Name: transactionid
Description: id of a transaction, or null if the object is not a transaction id

Name: classid
Description: oid of the system catalog containing the object, or null if the object is not a general database object

Name: objid
Description: oid of the object within its system catalog, or null if the object is not a general database object

Name: objsubid
Description: column number targeted by the lock (the classid and objid refer to the table itself), or zero if the target is some other general database object, or null if the target is not a general database object

Name: virtualtransaction
Description: virtual id of the transaction that is holding or awaiting this lock

Name: pid
Description: process id of the server process holding or awaiting this lock, or null if the lock is held by a prepared transaction

Name: mode
Description: name of the lock mode held or desired by this process

Name: granted
Description: true if lock is held, false if lock is awaited
